product_name: Edelrid Topaz ColorTec 9.2mm x 70m Dry Rope
long_description: The 70m-long Topaz ColorTec is triple rated, meaning it can be used as a single, half or twin rope, to meet your needs on any climbing adventure, from alpine multipitch to glacier travel.
short_description: The 70m-long Topaz ColorTec is triple rated, meaning it can be used as a single, half or twin rope, to meet your needs on any climbing adventure, from alpine multipitch to glacier travel.
